main.description:
I am a web devoloper engineer 
 When I was born, I did not cried but I shouted Hello World 
 I love the development frontend because I want everything to be beautiful! 
 I love the development of Backend because it allows me to keep the brain alive and in good shape. 
 I love computer and data science because it allows me to travel to an alternate world! 
 This is me, welcome to my world!
main.bio:
I am a Full stack js developer building websites and web applications.
 I specialize in JavaScript and have professional experience working with React js and Nodejs.
 I also have experience working with Vue, Angular
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch.

work.title: Full-stack Developer
work.description: Web platform allowing the gamification of courses: • Each learner answers the questions asked during the course and gets points according to the speed of answer to the questions and the accuracy of the answer • Monitor the presence of learners at class sessions • Forum and instant chat• Cloud deployment  technologies: Node.js, react js , mongoDB, Express.js, node-cron,REST-API,Heroku Cloud platform ,socket.io ,JWT,Passport

work.title: development of a platform for ESPRIT Graduation project interns
work.description: This application allows the processing of end of studies projects within an engineering school, from the start of the internship to the end. it displays a complete dashboard which will serve as a decision-making tool to allow the school to update the study plans (for example: add or delete modules). technologies: Angular 7 , Rest API , JAVA EE ,SQL ,PostMan ,Wildfly 11,Maven, JSP ,Github
